channel.title: Runescape Remake! [F2P ONLY]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090917132537/runescape/images/d/d9/Rune_two-handed_sword.PNG[/img][size=18pt][b]Runescape F2P Remake![/b][/size][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090917132537/runescape/images/d/d9/Rune_two-handed_sword.PNG[/img]
[u][b]Current Developers[/b][/u] The Unholy - Server coder
[u][b]What?[/b][/u] Runescape F2P Remake will be a private server (When completed) that consists of content so very similar to that of Runescape in early 2006, Including the 459 Gameframe, no godwars, no customs, no dragon boots, no member quests, etcetera...
[u][b]Why?[/b][/u] I personally, have been looking for a F2P private server to play, not just a crappy PK one, I found none, so I've decided to create my own, it will be an exact replica, or as close as I can get, remember, I'm not the most experienced of coders, but I can do my fair bit. I have predicted that, this server could become very popular, if hosted by the right person. This is NOT a new type of base, it is based off of Deltascape.
[u][b]Log[/b][/u] [b]29/5/2010;[/b] Every single EXP rate has been modified exactly to runescapes, including casting alchemy, curse spells, combat spells, ranging and meleeing. Started adding correct NPC's to Falador, Lumbridge, Al-Kharid & Varrock. Including shops, items, and stocks. Wider variation of F2P food added, including Swordfish, Tuna, Salmon, Bread, Shrimp and trout. References to Deltascape have been changed to Runescape until a name is thought of.
[b]30/5/2010;[/b] Finished adding all NPC's for Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock & Al Kharid, including correct shop items & stocks, also added correct 100% drops to; Cows, Goblins, Chickens & Al Kharid warriors. Made some doors work, including Gate to Al Kharid, Gate to cows, Goblin hut door, lumbridge church door, and lumbridge castle. Have added the following text when trying to perform members actions, including stealing, pickpocketing, crossing shortcuts, and casting members only teleportation spells, "Please login to a members server to use this feature.". Added more food to potions.java, including cake, which has 3 consumptions, and pizza & wine, which has two. (Wine giving the half full jug of wine). The new starter is that, exactly as that of Runescape, upon leaving tutorial island, still pondering on whether to actually add the island it's self as compulsory completion before being able to play.
[b]31/5/2010;[/b] Added correct Runescape exp for skills, including firemaking, mining, woodcutting, fishing, cooking, and Runecrafting. Finished Dragon slayer quest! Redone Rune mysteries, so that it involves the correct NPC's. Added boat ride to Karamja, starting on adding NPC's & the shop.
[b]2/6/2010;[/b] Have been busy, so no real updates, just placed all NPC's on Musa Point, including the rum shop, and banana trees now work. You can enter Karamja dungeon via the Volcano. Added tutorial island NPC's, am working on making it work. More to come.
[u][b]Screenshots[/b][/u]
[b]Constructive Criticism is always welcome! As well as opinions and suggestions! No references to "Delta fails" Or what have you, it provides a suitable base.[/b][/center]

item.title: Runescape Remake! [F2P ONLY]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

sig00:

But if its like runescape with the same exp rates and everything then its kinda pointless, people come to private servers to train skills faster and get money easier, correct me if I’m wrong.

That’s the EXP I’VE set it to, as default, if you wish to change it, edit potions.java for bone bury rates, magicspells.cfg for magic exp, search for addSkillXP(65, 6); in client.java for alchemy exp and search for 4*hitdiff in client.java for Melee/ranged exp.

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:11, topic:341941”][quote author=[J]ava link=topic=438352.msg3224063#msg3224063 date=1275426541]
Oh Oh, also…

To add the ‘You must be a member to wear this item.’ Isn’t that in the client? Don’t you have to remove something in it? I’m trying to find out, its becoming annoying adding the member items into a list.
[/quote]

You can set your client to run as non-members client would. All items that are defined as members items in the cache will show up as “members item”.[/quote]

How would I go about doing this?

Read full topic

Oh Oh, also…

To add the ‘You must be a member to wear this item.’ Isn’t that in the client? Don’t you have to remove something in it? I’m trying to find out, its becoming annoying adding the member items into a list.[/quote]

You can set your client to run as non-members client would. All items that are defined as members items in the cache will show up as “members item”.

item.title: Runescape Remake! [F2P ONLY]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Runescape F2P Remake![/size]

Current Developers
The Unholy - Server coder

What?
Runescape F2P Remake will be a private server (When completed) that consists of content so very similar to that of Runescape in early 2006, Including the 459 Gameframe, no godwars, no customs, no dragon boots, no member quests, etcetera…

Why?
I personally, have been looking for a F2P private server to play, not just a crappy PK one, I found none, so I’ve decided to create my own, it will be an exact replica, or as close as I can get, remember, I’m not the most experienced of coders, but I can do my fair bit. I have predicted that, this server could become very popular, if hosted by the right person. This is NOT a new type of base, it is based off of Deltascape.

Log
29/5/2010; Every single EXP rate has been modified exactly to runescapes, including casting alchemy, curse spells, combat spells, ranging and meleeing.
Started adding correct NPC’s to Falador, Lumbridge, Al-Kharid & Varrock. Including shops, items, and stocks.
Wider variation of F2P food added, including Swordfish, Tuna, Salmon, Bread, Shrimp and trout.
References to Deltascape have been changed to Runescape until a name is thought of.

30/5/2010; Finished adding all NPC’s for Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock & Al Kharid, including correct shop items & stocks, also added correct 100% drops to; Cows, Goblins, Chickens & Al Kharid warriors.
Made some doors work, including Gate to Al Kharid, Gate to cows, Goblin hut door, lumbridge church door, and lumbridge castle.
Have added the following text when trying to perform members actions, including stealing, pickpocketing, crossing shortcuts, and casting members only teleportation spells, “Please login to a members server to use this feature.”.
Added more food to potions.java, including cake, which has 3 consumptions, and pizza & wine, which has two. (Wine giving the half full jug of wine).
The new starter is that, exactly as that of Runescape, upon leaving tutorial island, still pondering on whether to actually add the island it’s self as compulsory completion before being able to play.

31/5/2010; Added correct Runescape exp for skills, including firemaking, mining, woodcutting, fishing, cooking, and Runecrafting.
Finished Dragon slayer quest!
Redone Rune mysteries, so that it involves the correct NPC’s.
Added boat ride to Karamja, starting on adding NPC’s & the shop.

2/6/2010; Have been busy, so no real updates, just placed all NPC’s on Musa Point, including the rum shop, and banana trees now work.
You can enter Karamja dungeon via the Volcano.
Added tutorial island NPC’s, am working on making it work.
More to come.

Screenshots

Constructive Criticism is always welcome! As well as opinions and suggestions!
No references to “Delta fails” Or what have you, it provides a suitable base.[/center]

Read full topic
